text: The right of a judgment creditor to bring an action to enforce a judgment in lieu of proceeding under this subchapter remains unimpaired.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 15-356.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-173, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 15-351.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 6 of the Uniform Enforcement of Foreign Judgments Act (1964). See 13 Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.

DC CODE § 15-356

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)
